mapper.select: select id, app_id as appId, type, name, label, description, is_required AS isRequired, sort, is_private AS isPrivate, config AS configStr, is_active AS isActive FROM rdm_app_attr where app_id = #{value} order by sort
select id, app_id as appId, type, name, label, description, is_required AS isRequired, sort, is_private AS isPrivate, config AS configStr, is_active AS isActive FROM rdm_app_attr where id = #{value}
